Description: Tiraz fragment woven in silk; decorated with two bands (loower band much damaged) bearing friezes of geometric and stylised vegetal motifs in undyed, yellow, green, blue and brown silk; one selvedge preserved, simple and decorated with two bands in red silk. Warp: silk, undyed and red, Z, 24/cm Weft: silk, undyed, Z, 20/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow, green, blue and brown, Z, 46/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
